snippet: Amid unruly proceedings inside and outside the courtroom, prosecutors rested their case against the band, accused of hooliganism over a protest at Moscow’s main cathedral.
abstract: Trial of three young Russian feminist musicians from punk band Pussy Riot lurches through its fifth day of unruly proceedings inside and outside the courtroom; prosecutors rest their case against the group, accused of hooliganism over a protest at Moscow's main cathedral.
lead_paragraph: Amid unruly proceedings inside and outside the courtroom, prosecutors rested their case against the band, accused of hooliganism over a protest at Moscow’s main cathedral.

headline.seo: Russian Punk Band’s Trial Inspires Protests
headline.main: Unruly Proceedings in Trial of Russian Punk Group
headline.print_headline: Unruly Proceedings in Trial Of Russian Punk Group
